channel.title: Data Analytics Portfolio on Christopher Steele
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analytics Portfolio on Christopher Steele

item.title: Project 1: Powerise Production Analysis Tool
item.description: Objective: Reduce the number of reworks required in the Powerise production process by creating a visualization tool to summarize the capability of a production build and help stakeholders root cause build/machine issues. Outcome: The visualization tool successfully summarizes the capability of builds in a visual and easy to understand way, and is now a required G5 deliverable for all Stabilus programs. The tool has been used to identify production build issues and has led to significant changes to the production control plan, such as:

item.title: Project 2: Warranty Aggregation Tool
item.description: Objective: Aggregate warranty data from multiple customer portals for monthly warranty reporting. Outcome: The aggregation tool successfully merges and summarizes data from various customer portals and is used in monthly warranty reporting, warranty problem solving, and prioritization. Process: Import Data Uploads data from multiple customer warranty AWS databases. Clean Data Created a system that automatically cleans, filters, and groups the data to make it easier to work with. Feature Engineering

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Chris Steele, and I am an aspiring Data Scientist. I’ve been working as an Applications Engineer for 6 years, but over the last few years, I’ve become more and more attracted to the fields of Data Science and Analytics. It began with me leading a work project relating to Big Data Analysis. While working on this project, I learned from the ground up how to program using Python, connect to SQL databases to query them, and create detailed visualizations that communicate complicated information in a simple way.
